tool.name: Output QC/Analysis in Excel
tool.description: Aggregate QC and Analysis files into excel sheet.

param.name: count_spikes
param.label: Count and Remove Spikes QC
param.help: QC output of count spikes and remove spikes steps.

param.name: align
param.label: MiXCR Align QC
param.help: QC output of mixcr alignment step.

param.name: assemble
param.label: MiXCR Assemble QC
param.help: QC output of mixcr assembly step.

param.name: decontam
param.label: Combined Decontamination QC
param.help: Aggregated QC files of decontamination step.

param.name: analysis
param.label: Analysis Metrics
param.help: Output of diversity analysis metrics from analysis step.

tool.help: This tool aggregates all of the previously-generated QC and analysis text files into a single excel workbook with named sheets.
